snippet.title: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma is rated Teen (T) by the Entertainment Software Ratings Board. For more information, please visit www.esrb.org/

Aksys Games is pleased to announce a launch bonus for the PlayStation®3 entertainment system 2D fighting game, BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma! 
________________

http://blazblueuniverse.com/
________________

With the Cauldron shattered and the cycle broken, Ragna begins his final mission: Hunt down the villainous Terumi. Noel's life and the fate of the entire world hang in the balance as the Bloodedge marches toward one last confrontation.
